title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1504.8 - Identification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1504.8 - Identification

State Regulations

Valves controlling water flow to sprinkler systems shall be
provided with durable identification signs with conspicuous lettering which
shall be installed in a permanent manner near such valves. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1504.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
